short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the (What's Hot) spam from Goog+

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I got tired of "What's Hot on Google+" spam.  The solutions I found all involved using a special script for AdBlocker Pro, User Scripts, Bookmarklets, etc.  This simply toggles the display of the "What's Hot on Google+" litter in your stream.
